title: Ryze feels a lot more brainless to play
body: He used to have a bunch of combos that he could use for different situations. If you want to escape a gank, it's QEWQ for the long snare. If you want a ton of damage, it was QWQEQ. If you wanted to waveclear, it was EEQ... Now it's just EQ. His E bounce does no damage. You need to Q to use the flux spread damage. I know that he's nearly impossible to balance, but these are my observations. I have no idea on how to fix him. Any ideas?

replies.body: They just turned him solely into a champ that's supposed to bully immobile melee toplaners, since we didn't have enough of those already {{champion:266}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:518}}

> [{quoted}](name=RyzÃª,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b5PZivju,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-23T02:45:00.317+0000)
>
> 44% win rate "bully"

He bullies certain champs effectively, yes. I didn't say he was strong though.
He is much weaker than before, in my opinion.
That was LITERALLY his problem. He had too many options and that made him too good in pro play and in high elo.
